name: Repentance
description: You shoot a ray of energy at a creature within a moderate (20 unit) distance dealing 16 divine damage upon failing a resilience check of 10. If the creature is humanoid or divine, it immediately uses a reaction to make an attack on an adjacent creature, prioritizing enemies before allied creatures.
charge: Upon failing, you can decide the target it attacks as well as forcing it to move up to it's movement speed towards it as part of the same action.
